item.title: How To Raise More Confident Kids
item.description: Brooke Romney joins Lisa to share practical, compassionate tips for helping kids develop the confidence they need to thrive. From teaching your teen conversation starters to helping them navigate disappointment, Brooke breaks down the small, teachable moments that build lasting confidence in our kids. Whether you’re raising toddlers, teens, or somewhere in between, this episode offers tools to help your kids navigate the world with kindness, resilience, and self-assurance... Feed: https://www.byuradio.org/rss/showpodcastfeed/fbb6e706-8810-488e-b8d2-644beb04f938

item.title: Art Without Borders - RAJIV MENON'S Vision for South Asian Art
item.description: Rajiv Menon Contemporary, South Asian art, diaspora, Indian contemporary art, cultural identity, non-residency, nostalgia, partition, migration, exoticism, mythology, textiles, craft traditions, sustainability, India, Pakistan, creative process podcast, creativity, Mia Funk, creative process Feed: https://thecreativeprocess.squarespace.com/art?format=rss
